line.comment: * resetting some variables which are obsolete without OCV portal
* Phanon sacrifices itself and the entire faction dies
* currently claimed Phanon sectors should go to the claimant via !station.signal.killed
* all other Phanon sectors go to the player
* abort any ongoing coordinated invasions against Phanon if any
* Herobetty 4.5: Pirate bases and company stations will be ignored. Otherwise, initialize the station as follows.
* reward player by unlocking all phanon blueprints
* destroy all Xenon and OCV ships
* currently claimed Xenon sectors should go to the claimer via !station.signal.killed
* abort any ongoing coordinated invasions against Phanon if any
* Add-Ons 1.2: Set a global variable to mark the plot as completed. This is used to ensure that Phanon ships do not incur the +35% maintenance penalty.

sval.val: resetting some variables which are obsolete without OCV portal
Phanon sacrifices itself and the entire faction dies
currently claimed Phanon sectors should go to the claimant via !station.signal.killed
all other Phanon sectors go to the player
abort any ongoing coordinated invasions against Phanon if any
Herobetty 4.5: Pirate bases and company stations will be ignored. Otherwise, initialize the station as follows.
reward player by unlocking all phanon blueprints
destroy all Xenon and OCV ships
currently claimed Xenon sectors should go to the claimer via !station.signal.killed
abort any ongoing coordinated invasions against Phanon if any
Add-Ons 1.2: Set a global variable to mark the plot as completed. This is used to ensure that Phanon ships do not incur the +35% maintenance penalty.
